page.title: 17Costs of Barley Growing
page.content:
In 1984 these were the average costs of growing an acre of barley on a farm in the Langford Area. Seed 136lbs...............17.78 Fertilizer(In seed beds)..13.39 Nitrogen(86.25 units).....15.25 Weedkiller spray(Autumn)..12.37 Weedkiller spray(Spring)..08.56 Total....67.35 Fixed Costs(salaries,fuel, machinery etc.)........142.00
Yield of about 2.3tons per acre. In 1984 barley sold at 105 pounds per ton. Total income per acre.....241.50 Total profit per acre......32.15
In 1985 barley is selling for only 92 pounds per ton. Fixed costs have risen.
